title: Zelenskyy announces resignation of chief of staff and lead negotiator in peace talks Andrii Yermak
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced Friday the resignation of his powerful chief of staff, Andrii Yermak, who was also the country's lead negotiator in talks with the U.S, after Yermak's residence was searched by anti-corruption investigators.

title: Ukraine's president is under growing pressure. Here are 5 things to know
description: The president of Ukraine is facing a confluence of crises testing his ability to lead an increasingly weary nation nearly four years into a devastating full-scale invasion by Russia.  For more than a week, Volodymyr Zelenskyy has struggled to contain the fallout from a $100 million corruption scandal implicating top officials and other associates.  The pressure on Zelenskyy has ratcheted up as the United States pushes a proposal it drew up with Russia that would require major concessions from Ukraine — and seemingly few from Russia — to bring an end to the war.

title: Putin cautiously welcomes U.S. peace plan as Trump issues challenge to Zelenskyy
description: A U.S. peace proposal seen as favoring Russia stipulates Ukraine to hand over some territory to Putin.
